original: śraddhendriyaṃ, vīryendriyaṃ, smṛtīndriyaṃ, samādhīndriyaṃ, prajñendriyam | saṃ pūrṇāṃ pañcānāṃ lokottarāṇāmindriyāṇāmabhijñātvāt tīkṣṇatvācca śīghravāhitvācca kṣipravedhānantvarthaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yadutāvadāṇāṃ kṣayāya |

original: ihaikatyaḥ pudugalaḥ prakṛtyaivālagrāmo bhavati, alpaduḥkho bhavati, alpamoho bhavati | so'smagāmatayā nādhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati, alpa-devasayā nādhīkṣṇaṃ dveṣajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati, alpamohatayā nādhīkṣṇaṃ mohajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi dhanyāni bhavanti, mṛdūni, na tīkṣṇāni, na śīghravāhīni | katamāni pañca ? yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ, vīryendriyaṃ, smṛtīndriyaṃ, samādhīndriyaṃ, prajñendriyam | sa pūrṇāṃ pañcānāṃ lokottarāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ dhanyatvādatīkṣṇatvāccāmṛdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhanyavedhānantvarthaṃ-samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya |
analyzed: iha ekatyaḥ pudugalaḥ prakṛtyā eva ālagrāmaḥ bhavati alpa duḥkhaḥ bhavati alpa mohaḥ bhavati saḥ asmagāma tayā na adhīkṣṇam rāga jam duḥkha daurmanasyam pratisaṃvedayati alpa devasayā na adhīkṣṇam dveṣa jam duḥkha daurmanasyam pratisaṃvedayati alpa moha tayā na adhīkṣṇam moha jam duḥkha daurmanasyam pratisaṃvedayati  /
iyathā ucyate sukhā dhanyā abhijñā

original: (4) tatra katamā sukhā pratipadu vidyābhijñā ? ihaikatyaḥ pudugalaḥ prakṛtyaiva-lagrāmo bhavati, alpaduḥkho, alpamohaḥ | so'lparāgatayā nādhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati, alpadveṣatayā nādhīkṣṇaṃ dveṣajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ prati-saṃvedayati, alpamohatayā nādhīkṣṇaṃ mohajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi abhimatrāṇi bhavanti, tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni | katamāni pañca ? yaduta—śraddhendriyaṃ, vīryendriyaṃ, smṛtīndriyaṃ, samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam | sa pūrṇāṃ pañcānāṃ lokottarāṇāmindriyāṇāmabhimātratvāt tīkṣṇatvācca śīghravāhitvācca kṣipravedhānantvarthaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yadutāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya |[32]
analyzed: tatra katamā sukhā vidyā abhijñā iha ekatyaḥ pudugalaḥ prakṛtyā evala grāmaḥ bhavati alpa duḥkhaḥ alpa mohaḥ saḥ alpa rāga tayā na adhīkṣṇam rāga jam duḥkha daurmanasyam pratisaṃvedayati alpa dveṣa tayā na adhīkṣṇam dveṣa jam duḥkha daurmanasyam pratisaṃvedayati alpa moha tayā na adhīkṣṇam moha jam duḥkha daurmanasyam pratisaṃvedayati tasya imāni pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi abhimatrāṇi bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śīghra vāhīni katamāni
iyam ucyate sukhā pratipad viśuddhi mārgā

catasraḥ samādhi bhāvanāḥ

original: (1) asti bhikṣavaḥ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāyaṃ saṃvartate |
